ygData.subject: Re: Shadow knight quest
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a quest in Freeport. Steadirt i believe is a weapons shop keeper. I havent done this yet becuase i like to build my faction until the fools trust me,
ygData.messageBody:
This is a quest in Freeport.
Steadirt i believe is a weapons shop keeper.
I havent done this yet becuase i like to build my faction until the
fools trust me, then i start murdering their friends and family.
But from personal experience with other quests, the person you kill
doesnt always leave what he's supposed to.
Case in point:
In Qeynos, i had to kill Trumpy Irontoe 3 times before he dropped his
head for me. The multiple killings led to faction problems, and got me
KoS by a few NPCs, one
even in my own guild.
So, if you are concerned about your faction standing, kill orcs. Lots
of orcs until the shop keepers all like you, giving you some freedom
to do really naughty things afterward.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
